errors.error_description: Specifies outdated Python 2.7+ and Django 1.8+ version requirements which are no longer supported
correction_candidates: This package requires Python 3.8+ and Django 3.2+ for current support.
This package requires a combination of Python and Django that is currently supported.
This package requires Python 3.6+ and Django 2.2+ minimum versions.
This package supports Python 3.7+ and Django 3.0+ as minimum requirements.
errors.golden_answer: This package requires a combination of Python and Django that is currently supported.
